name: schwab-dashboard-react
Author: Jason Levitt
description: A NodeJS stock dashboard Using recharts and the schwab-client-js library

scripts.open: node -e "setTimeout(() => { const { exec } = require('child_process'); const openCmd = process.platform === 'darwin' ? 'open' : process.platform === 'win32' ? 'start' : 'xdg-open'; exec(openCmd + ' http://localhost:5173'); }, 2000);"
